thread.title: Insta-proud celeb moms
thread.title_full: Insta-proud celeb moms | mb.com.ph | Philippine News

author: Jon Montesa
title: Insta-proud celeb moms
text:
by Jon Montesa
September 30, 2015 These kids of celebrities aren’t on TV every day but they are always on their mothers’ social media accounts. Here, Bulletin Entertainment takes a look at some of the moments they share with their famous parents, immortalized on their respective Instagram accounts:
THE FASHIONISTA
Andi Eigenmann’s daughter, Adrianna Gabrielle “Ellie,” has gained a huge following on the photo sharing app, thanks to her mom’s effort in highlighting her innate cuteness and charm.
A constant on her account is Ellie showing followers her outfit of the day (OOTD).
Mother and daughter also love to travel.
Andi captioned a photo of themselves enjoying a moment on the beach, “Definitely another milestone for my little mermaid. I still can’t get over how proud I am of my 3yo who fearlessly jumped off the boat in the middle of the ocean and swam with all the fishes at Balicasag Island in Bohol. Best birthday gift ever. YOU ARE MY CHILD!!”
THE KIKAY FIGHTER
Jackie Forster’s only daughter, Caleigh, was diagnosed with leukemia when she was three.
The former actress uses her Instagram account to share with followers how her daughter has remained strong and cheerful despite her condition.
Thankfully, Caleigh is now cancer-free after more than a year of therapy.
“She’s been in remission for over a year, wala na siyang cancer,” Jackie said in a recent interview with GMA-7.
On her fifth birthday, Jackie posted, “Nothing and nobody can take what’s destined for you from you my Love. In God’s time your dreams will come true because you have talents to be used for His greater glory! And you have such a kind and loving spirit. We love you so much my princess.”
UNICO HIJO
Asia’s Songbird Regine Velasquez-Alcasid has been keeping followers updated on moments in the life of her son, Nathaniel James “Nate.”
Proudly describing him as energetic and talented, she even shared a two-part video of what she said was a jam session between her son and her husband, Ogie Alcasid. The first part got 3,633 likes while the other garnered 4,397.
Regine always makes time for her son. One proud moment for the singer is when she attended a school activity for “Buwan ng Wika,” with Nate showing off his dancing skills.
ENDORSER SIBLINGS
Kendra, Scarlett, and Gavin, the children of actress Chesca Garcia and PBA player Douglas Kramer, are already stars in their own right. In fact, they have been tapped as endorsers of several noted brands.
Team Kramer
Chesca couldn’t be prouder of her children. She once posted a photo of her three kids captioned: “My joy and happiness… My children!”
Just recently, Team Kramer participated in an outreach program giving goods and toys to 120 orphans. The 35-year-old actress-model was so delighted that her children joined them in the effort.
TRES MARIAS
Sunshine Cruz has three beautiful daughters with estranged husband Cesar Montano: Angel Francheska, Samantha Angeline, and Angeline Isabelle.
Sunshine Cruz with her three daughters
All honor students at De La Salle Santiago Zobel, Samantha ranked third in her class and as a gift, Sunshine treated the young Ariana Grande to the pop star’s recent concert in the country. Angeline also got the third spot while Franceska ranked first in their respective class.
She posted on Instagram a collage of the commendation papers her children received, writing, “Paramihan ng commendations ang Tres Marias ko!! Thank you kids! Yes! I am a proud mom. Love you three!”
